messages.title: Getting the best for Nottingham South
messages.content: On the reverse of this leaflet, you will see some of the key priorities I have for our local area, as well as my record of standing up for Nottingham South in Parliament.

messages.title: Why I'm backing Lilian Greenwood
messages.content: [Name removed] says: 'I'm backing Lilian because of her tireless work standing up for Nottingham South - from securing investments in our transport system to backing local businesses and jobs. She has always put Nottingham South first.'

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Vote for a better Brexit that works for every community.
We will oppose cuts to our schools.
We will stand up for living standards.

issues.brexitEurope: Vote for a better Brexit that works for every community.
issues.education: We will oppose cuts to our schools.
issues.socialWelfare: We will stand up for living standards.

housing.content: Vote for action on the housing crisis.
